diff_act: 2.initiate the process to enter or verify train data
3.ensure all required information is accurate and up to date before confirming it
4.enter train data automatically if the system detects the necessary information from integrated sensors or pre-set schedules
5.Enable driver to consult the entered train data at any time before departure.

generation1:
#step1: Step 1: Analyze and extract function points
The extracted fine-grained function points include: 1) Train data must be entered before movement is allowed. 2) Driver should be able to select Train Data Entry on the DMI. 3) Driver can manually enter or overwrite data when stationary. 4) Train data can be entered automatically. 5) Driver can consult data when stationary. 6) Data stored in ETCS until the train is inoperative. 7) Stored data must be confirmed by driver at Data Entry start.

#step2: Step 2: Locate the incompleteness
Function Point 1 is resolved by Spec 1; Function Point 2 is resolved by Spec 2; Function Point 3 is resolved by Spec 3; Function Point 4 is resolved by Spec 4; Function Point 5 is resolved by Spec 5; Function Point 6 is resolved by Spec 6; Function Point 7 is resolved by Spec 7.
All points seem to be covered by the specifications.
Thus, this seems like an S2 situation (implied absence).

#step3: Step 3: Detect the specific incompleteness
Since it is S2, I will examine for possible hidden situations or action incompleteness.
Operation sequence insight: Step 3 mentions ensuring the accuracy and up-to-date information before confirming, which is not covered in the specifications.
The requirements do not detail how confirmation should be handled concerning the accuracy of the data.
This could imply action incompletenessâ€”ensuring data verification before confirmation.

#step4: Step 4: Summary and generation
Given the implied absence due to lack of detail on ensuring data accuracy and up-to-date information before confirmation, a new specification is generated to address this.

regen.absent_element: procedure to ensure data accuracy and up-to-date information before confirmation
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify that all train data entered is accurate and up-to-date before allowing the driver to confirm it at the Data Entry start.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
